manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Frequently Asked Questions & Answer： 1. Q: Why didn't I receive the battery? Do I need buy an extra battery? A: The rechargeable battery is in the fan so you don't need to buy another battery or load the battery. Just use it and charge it when its battery runs out of power. 2. Q: I bought a fan that has insulating piece earier. Why is the one I bought recently without insulating piece? A: Thank you for your continued support. We optimize die structure of the fan. Please don't worry about it. 3. Q: How long does the battery take to charge a full charge? A: When charging the battery, there is a red light, it will becomes to green light if the battery is fully recharged. The charging time is about 3 hours, please make sure it's fully charged before shutting off power. 4. Q: How to recharge the mini handheld fan? A: Connect the inlcuded USB cable to 5V output adapter like phone charger, or power bank, or other USB outlet devices to charge the fan. 5. Q: Can I use it on a stroller? A: Yes. it comes with a metal clip, please find the two holes in the sides above the handle, insert the clip along the two grooves, so that it can be used in a stroller, office folding screen, pram, camping tent, student's bed, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stay Cool Anywhere, Anytime with VersionTECH. Mini Handheld Fan!
reviews.reviewText: In a world where the summer sun can turn a day outdoors into an oven, the VersionTECH. Mini Handheld Fan emerges as your trusty sidekick, keeping you cool and comfortable wherever you go. This USB rechargeable fan is more than just a breeze; it's a lifeline in the scorching heat.First, let's talk power. This portable fan boasts a super-strong wind, thanks to its high-effective motor. It spins at a remarkable 3,600 revolutions per minute, delivering a refreshing gust of cool air that will have you sighing in relief on the hottest of days. With VersionTECH., you're not just getting a fan; you're getting a mini cyclone of comfort.Customization is the name of the game with this fan. It offers three adjustable speed levels – low, medium, and high. With a simple press of the power button, you can find the perfect breeze to suit your mood and comfort. The six sturdy fan blades ensure that the wind reaches you, even up to 3 meters away. Plus, the brushless motor not only keeps things durable but also eco-friendly by conserving energy.Versatility is another highlight. This mini desk fan can be folded up to 180°, making it adaptable to any situation. Whether you're holding it in your hand, placing it on the table, hanging it on a sun umbrella, or clipping it onto objects, it's designed to fit your lifestyle. If you ever need help figuring it out, just take a look at the picture or reach out to the helpful VersionTECH. team.But here's where it gets interesting – the hanging umbrella design. This unique feature allows you to hang the fan above your umbrella or parasol, creating a cooling oasis on even the hottest of summer days. It's a game-changer for outdoor activities, ensuring you stay cool no matter where you are.And when it comes to portability, VersionTECH. doesn't disappoint. This fan is designed to be your travel companion. Pop it in your bag, and you're ready for summer adventures, whether it's attending sporting events, going on a summer road trip, or simply lounging by the pool.In conclusion, the VersionTECH. Mini Handheld Fan is more than just a cooling device; it's your personal oasis in the heat. With its powerful wind, adjustable speeds, versatile design, and unique hanging umbrella feature, it's a must-have for summer. So, when the temperature soars, don't sweat it – reach for your VersionTECH. fan and stay cool wherever life takes you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My initial review was not so good. The device essentially failed when I took it ...
reviews.reviewText: My initial review was not so good. The device essentially failed when I took it on it's first trip (it's intended use). After returning from my trip, I wrote a scathing review on it's failure and on some potential issues this product would have including the hinge that seemed like it would break after repeated uses. Unfortunately, what failed was something with the switch that prevented the device from actually being used. I was unable to switch between the different speeds, and at times, would not even turn on. The company saw my review and immediately sent a replacement. It's been about a year now since I got the replacement and I now have real-world, long-term use on it. Here's my review...This fan has made it through the Spring humidity in Arlington, VA, camping from CA to WY, and numerous trips to Southern CA at Disneyland. It's intended use has exceeded my expectations. My concerns about the so-so build quality, the hinge, and the questionable electronics and battery have subsided. That being said, I still do have concerns about all these things, but after over a year (with reasonable care and transport) this product still has not failed. This is a great product, despite my concerns, as it does what it's intended to do... and does it well.Pros:* Has (3) speeds to choose from (Low, Medium, High).* Pushes a lot of air for it's size at all speed levels.* Compact (enough) to be stored easily.* Can be charged directly with any micro-USB cable.* Included battery is replaceable with any lithium 18650 battery when it eventually fails (average 18650 battery has about 300 full cycles/charges.)* Included battery will last at least a full day of on/off use (I have not tested continuous use time, but using it frequently throughout the day, lasted at least a full day.)* Reasonable on weight and would not be noticed in a bag, backpack, murse (man-purse), fanny pack, or hanging on a lanyard.* Customer service is great. They proactively reached out to me fix my issue. This is how true online services needs to be.Cons: (Note: These cons have not surfaced, therefore no stars were deducted.)* Build quality is questionable. Although, it is reasonable due to this price point.* Hinge longevity. Although I still question the durability of this hinge, after moderate use, I have not seen any issues, but it is still a concern.* Included lithium battery does not have a point/nub/nipple on the (+) side of the battery. Be mindful of reinstallation.* Charging status light can be a bit more obvious.Overall, despite my cons, this product has performed wonderfully. After a year of use, it's held up quite well. The overall performance, build quality, and features make this a quite a value at this price point. With this exceptionally hot weather we've been having the last few season has made considered purchasing more of this product. I would highly recommend this product.
Fan speed is good, fan is very handy and light weight, can fit into sling bag.I had a similar fan from Opolar brand, but this is much more compact and efficient.

Exactly as described. Very quiet and puts out a lot of air for such a small device. It has low medium and high speeds and I’ve yet to need to put it past low. So far battery has not died on me. Very compact and easy to take with you in your purse. Has been incredibly helpful with my hot flashes! Recommend!!

ottimo ventilatore portatile, arriva con una batteria al litio da 2000mah gia inserita, hab manico pieghevole che funge anche da base, 3 velocità e fa molta aria e rinfresca molto, ho preso questo modello perché a differenza di altri la batteria è sostituibile, sono le batterie al litio 18650 ed ho il caricabatterie anche il ventilatore stesso é provvisto di presa microusb quella dei cellulari e si puo facilmente ricaricare, il prezzo ho visto che varia io ne presi 3 a poco più di 10€
